GameConditionDef.label: crystalline redshift
GameConditionDef.description: A colonist has succumbed to injuries sustained by a living crystal. The world chills and the sky reddens. All who witness this phenomenon will be saddened.
GameConditionDef.letterText: A forboding redshift is occuring in the sky above.\n\nThe shift in colors will drag moods down and the day will be darker, the night even more so.
